items.title: AI Is Redefining What A Company Even Looks Like
items.description: As AI makes it easier to build a company, founders are discovering that building faster is not the same as building well.

items.title: In Davos, Art Makes Humans Part Of The Environment
items.description: At the World Economic Forum's annual meeting, artist and technologist Ronen Tanchum taps AI for an installation that merges real-time climate data and...

items.title: Why ‘Stranger Things’ Would Have Been So Much Better Without Vecna
items.description: Why removing the villain might have led to a scarier, more mysterious, and emotionally stronger series overall.

items.title: Adobe’s AI-Powered PDFs Now Talk Back
items.description: Adobe’s latest Acrobat AI Assistant update transforms static PDFs, the most common file type in business, into interactive, voice-driven resources.

items.title: WhatsApp Is Finally About To Launch A Long-Anticipated New Feature
items.description: WhatsApp is working on a major upgrade to improve how the app will work on the web. At last.
